name: CLAUSETTE
description:
Clausette is a text-based interactive game where you play as a high school student, Cace. As he goes through the motions of an unhealthy relationship, you may choose to open up to your friends about it, or close yourself off. Decisions that you make will influence what you’ll be able to say to his friends, and can alter Cace's path...

Clausette combines adventure and storytelling to convey the theme of vulnerability. The game takes place over four chapters, where you can explore different and similar areas across different parts of Cace’s week.

...
